snippet.title: Trine 4 - Release Date Reveal Trailer | Available Oct 8
snippet.description:
Experience the most complete Trine ever created! Trine 4: The Nightmare Prince and Trine: Ultimate Collection arrive October 8. Pre-order now: https://www.trine4.com/?utm_source=youtube&utm_medium=description&utm_campaign=dateannounce#store

The Trine series returns to the magic of 2.5D with Trine 4: The Nightmare Prince! The three heroes of the best-selling adventure series are back, sent on a quest to retrieve the troubled young Prince Selius. Amadeus the Wizard, Pontius the Knight, and Zoya the Thief are joined together once again on a thrilling quest through fantastical fairytale landscapes teeming with danger.

Trine 4 reaches new heights in the series, bringing the most complete 2.5D gameplay experience ever to fans and new players alike. Pre-order now!

Find us on Steam: https://modus.games/trine4-steam
Join our Discord: https://modus.games/discord
Like us on Facebook: https://modus.games/facebook
Follow us on Twitter: https://modus.games/twitter
Like Trine on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/trineseries/
Follow Trine on Twitter: https://twitter.com/TrineSeries
